content.text: From August 4-5, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 5 new pull requests (all of which were merged), 7 new issues created, and 8 active contributors participating in the project during this period.
PR #5712 by @wtfsayo titled 'Fix memory count and agent id errors' is open.
PR #5711 by @wtfsayo titled 'Fix agent id uuid conversion in getAgent command' is open.
PR #5710 by @wtfsayo titled 'Fix agent config output exclusion' is open.
PR #5709 by @wtfsayo titled 'feat: Integrate API client and standardize workspace dependencies' is merged.
PR #5682 titled 'feat: add CLI delegation debug tool' is merged.
PR #5684 titled 'feat: Boostrap event / logging improvement' is merged.
PR #5705 titled 'fix/elizaos test component' is merged.
Issue #5573 titled '`feat(cli): Add 'elizaos scenario run' command`' by @linear is CLOSED after being open for approximately three weeks.
Issue #5644 titled 'morpho plugin' by @linear is CLOSED after being open for approximately two weeks.
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
